text:
Who'd have thunk this would be announced at 5 p.m. Eastern time on a Friday afternoon?
#snark
author: ChrisKaergard

text:
Because we were so rushed last week (and on a much shorter visit than usual) it was the first time in seven years I haven't stopped in for lunch or dinner there while in the area. 
Felt genuine regret about that.
author: ChrisKaergard

text:
You already know this, but 17th St.

Up here? I'm partial to Blue Duck in Peoria.
author: ChrisKaergard

text: Even in summer? It's roasting then.
author: ChrisKaergard

text:
Congratulations to everyone's favorite large-footed gargoyle. But they've gotta get its name right.

The exclamation point, alas, is part of that.
author: ChrisKaergard
